attributes.action: Virgin Media TV to relaunch TCC and launch CD:UK channel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to Digital Spy website, Living2 will be renamed later in the year and given a clearer personality and proposition. 
 
Well I got petition for Living2.
 
During 6am-5pm, the output of the channel would given over to comeback of Flextech's old kids channel TCC, from 5pm-8pm running in conjunction with TCC, CD:UK would broadcast taking the format of the axed ITV Saturday morning television show upon which is based then from 8pm the new look Living2 takes over.

Well I still think The Childrens Channel (TCC) would be good to comeback with the programming they had could knocks spots of the kids channel we have today.
 
CD:UK should reborn as the chanenl from 5pm-9pm, there hasn't been a live music shows on TV since Top of the Pops ended.

rejection.details: This is a purely commercial decision, and not something on which this Office can comment.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
